citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 on June 30,
2021. Inspector honked horn, called out for licensee, dialed listed numbers and left message. Last attempt to contact was
at 11:45.
Additional Inspectors:
WILLIAM MCGRUDER, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

2021.  Inspector honked horn, called out for licensee, dialed listed numbers and left message. Last attempt to contact was 
at 11:45.
